title: How to Quickly Chill Wine or Champagne
description:
In today's OXO Good Tips video, we show how to quickly chill a bottle of wine or champagne.

Simply place your bottle into an ice bucket then add ice, salt and cold water. Wait for about 10 minutes for the salty ice water mixture chill the bottle. Cheers to never serving a warm glass of wine again!

asset.author: OXO
